name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
summary: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader is a mobile video game based on the Disney's Fox 2000 Pictures and Walden Media movie of the same name. Developed by Fox Digital Entertainment, it was released in 2010. It is a sequel to The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe and Prince Caspian movie-based video games.
